name: Sanam Teri Kasam
description: Tough ex-convict Inder and traditional mousy Saraswati fall in love and get married, but a tragedy changes their lives forever. The film is a modern rendition of the legends of Shiva-Sati and the novel Love Story by Eric Segal.

name: Gullak
description: Set in quaint by-lanes in the heart of India, Gullak is a collection of disarming and relatable tales of the Mishra family.

episodes.name: Tehri
episodes.description: A sweet and sour tiff between mother-son projects the disappointments that both have against each other. The mother worries that her son is jobless and dislikes her son fussing about the food not being served. Stay tuned to know how this family goes about their uniqueness.

episodes.name: Hum Do Humare Do
episodes.description: Both the brothers fight over the volume of the television. Aman requests his mother to convince Annu to make a drawing for his practical exam, starting another argument.

episodes.name: Itwaar
episodes.description: On a not-so-good Sunday morning, Annu's mother wakes up to the alarm ringing. With the arrival of Sunday, most middle class families plan to make it special. Watch to know more about how special is their Sunday!

episodes.name: Batti Aa Gayi
episodes.description: Aman enquires about Annu who hasn't returned home till late. Annu's father is relaxed while waiting for him. Annu returns to only demand for a scooty, making up excuses for being late.

episodes.name: Tyohaar
episodes.description: It's Raksha Bandhan. Shanti falls sick but has to work all day. Annu shares his exam results with Aman, so he suggests him to run away. Shanti falls unconscious on hearing about Annu's exam results.

episodes.name: Bijlee Ka Bill
episodes.description: Mishra house has received an inflated electricity bill. While a lot of speculation goes into how the bill has exceeded all limits, it is revealed that this problem has struck other households in the colony too. This turns out to be a great oppurunity for Santosh Mishra to make some extra money and fulfil a few family dreams.

episodes.name: Cheeni Kam, Paani Zyaada
episodes.description: Shanti Mishra is dragged to a free medical camp by Bittu ki mummy and is surprised that she has been diagnosed with diabetes. There is a kitty party round the corner which has already been planned and Mummy is in no mood to cancel the same. Mishra ji realises this and says that the boys will do the preparation.

episodes.name: Saparivaar
episodes.description: Annu gets a call where he is summoned to Pinky Mama’s house for 2 weeks as his daughter Raanu is getting married. The entire family gets excited and starts preparing. But the excitement disappears soon when the wedding card arrives and it doesn’t mention ‘Saparivaar’.

episodes.name: Kal Board Ka Paper Hai
episodes.description: Annu organises a cricket match screening at Prinsu, the Nagar Palika election candidate's bungalow, hoping to get a gas agency license in return. Mishra Ji joins the gathering. Meanwhile, Aman despite being told to study for his board exams, decides to sneak into the screening.

episodes.name: Kiraana
episodes.description: D day for Mishra family. Today is the day Annu is supposed to get his gas agency license and Aman gets his board results. A big day for them both.

episodes.name: Mission Admission
episodes.description: The Mishra family has grown in age, experience and comfort. Aman, the younger son, is now in plus two with big dreams while the elder son has his own desires. But when dreams and desires cross paths, Annu realizes that for his familial duties and responsibilities, some aspirations must wait.

episodes.name: LTA
episodes.description: Just like every middle-class family, Santosh Mishra travels back home and aspires to use the LTA.

episodes.name: Agua
episodes.description: Young Santosh Mishra had great expertise in fixing marriages. Santosh Mishra, an ex-Agua, is compelled to arrange a marriage that involves a young girl and her mother.

episodes.name: Satyanarayan Varta Katha
episodes.description: Satyanarayan Varta Katha = The world where not everything goes according to plan. Be it education, promotion, or expectations. A family plagued with fears of failure takes steps.

episodes.name: Izzat Ki Chamkaar
episodes.description: The Mishra Parivar is hit by health scare. It tries to come to terms with norms in the society we live in. Some members have deep realizations, some change their previously held notions, some grow up. The family experientially learns, loves, cares, bonds, and protects itself more than it ever did.

episodes.name: 'Kaaran Batau' Notice
episodes.description: Annu faces a demanding new boss, while the Mishra family battles corruption, navigating the treacherous path between integrity and desperation in their struggle to save their home.

episodes.name: Chinaiti
episodes.description: Shanti Mishra's trip to the temple turns tragic when a chain snatching incident traumatises her. Annu, Aman and Santosh have differing opinions regarding the incident.

episodes.name: Ghar Ka Kabaad
episodes.description: The Mishra family embarks on clearing out the clutter from their home. The arrival of the scrap dealer in Mishra Nivas creates amusing challenges for the family that's divided on what to sell and what to retain.

episodes.name: Teesra Pahiya
episodes.description: Annu faces challenges at work while Aman prepares to be the third wheel on Surya Narayan's date with a girl. Meanwhile, Santosh and Shanti are concerned about Aman's behaviour changing for the worse.

episodes.name: Pita, Putra aur Prempatra
episodes.description: Annu navigates work pressures, while Aman's rebellion leads to a family conflict.

name: The Family Man
description: The story of a middle-class man who works for a special cell of the National Investigation Agency. While he tries to protect the nation from terrorists, he also has to protect his family from the impact of his secretive, high-pressure, and low paying job.

episodes.name: The Family Man
episodes.description: Srikant Tiwari, a member of TASC, a discreet intelligence agency, is assigned to interrogate suspected ISIS recruits. Balancing his personal life with work becomes a challenge for this family man, and things get out of hand on both fronts.

episodes.name: Sleepers
episodes.description: A scooter bomb goes off at Kala Ghoda. Srikant learns about a mission called Zulfiqar. Suspects in the blast case tell him about a drop box near Victoria College. He arranges for round-the-clock surveillance at the drop box location.

episodes.name: Anti-National
episodes.description: When he finds out that one of the hospitalised prisoners is part of Mission Zulfiqar, Srikant interrogates the prisoner’s friend, Moosa, about it. Someone called Kareem has used the dropbox. TASC monitors Kareem’s hostel room, but Kareem gives them the slip.

episodes.name: Patriots
episodes.description: TASC is in a quandary. They fear Kareem and his men have a devious plan. They get to Kareem’s car, only to realise that things are not what they seem.

episodes.name: Pariah
episodes.description: ISI agent Sameer sends the Kala Ghoda bomber to Kashmir to execute Mission Zulfiqar. Srikant is ‘punished’ and sent to Kashmir, but when his boss, Kulkarni, tells him it was planned, Srikant starts digging into Zulfiqar.

episodes.name: Dance of Death
episodes.description: Srikant discovers that he’s been after the wrong suspect all this time.

episodes.name: Paradise
episodes.description: Srikant searches for Sajid at a wedding in Baramulla. Pakistan’s PM finds out about Zulfiqar and tries to stop it.

episodes.name: Act of War
episodes.description: Srikant helps CIA locate Faizan, a wanted man hiding in Balochistan. Srikant slips into Pakistan to interrogate Faizan.

episodes.name: Fighting Dirty
episodes.description: Srikant tries to thwart a plan to smuggle nerve gas canisters from Kashmir into Delhi.

episodes.name: The Bomb
episodes.description: TASC realises that Mission Zulfiqar is not over. There is a Plan B. And it has already been put to action.

episodes.name: Exile
episodes.description: Srikant Tiwari has started a new life as an IT employee, but he can’t stay away from adventure when JK is sent to Chennai to nab a former foreign insurgent. Chennai TASC agent, Muthu and JK are faced with a hostage situation in Chennai. And Dhriti may have a boyfriend.

episodes.name: Weapon
episodes.description: Suchitra wants Srikant to go for couple counselling. Prime Minister Basu wants to make up for India’s recent foreign policy faux pas. Bhaskaran activates an elite unit with Major Sameer’s help. A creep harasses Raji.

episodes.name: Angel of Death
episodes.description: Suchitra’s birthday dinner triggers a showdown between Srikant and Suchitra. Srikant quits his IT job and joins back TASC. Raji’s boss is onto her secret life and blackmails her.

episodes.name: Eagle
episodes.description: Srikant starts investigating in Chennai. Sajid teams up with Selva and Raji. Wonder who they are targeting! Inspector Umayal starts investigating Nanda’s disappearance.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.description: Inspector Umayal wants to join the TASC team in their mission. All roads lead to the old base.

episodes.name: Martyrs
episodes.description: Srikant and team manage to nab Raji. But they find out the hard way that they are way in over their heads. TASC suffers a tragic loss.

episodes.name: Collateral Damage
episodes.description: Raji is injured days before the D-Day and needs treatment. Simmering tensions between Suchitra and Dhriti hit a crescendo. Sajid bids adieu to Raji, for he has another, personal mission to accomplish in Mumbai. Meanwhile, Srikant is hit by another debilitating personal crisis.

episodes.name: Vendetta
episodes.description: The hunt is on for Dhriti. Meanwhile, JK and Muthu decide to check out Tigris Aviation, and walk into a trap. Dhriti’s loss of innocence is gruesome.

episodes.name: The Final Act
episodes.description: News about JK forces Srikant to rush back to Chennai. Raji hears about Sajid's fate. Dhriti finds out the true nature of Srikant's job. Prime Minister Basu reaches Chennai for bilateral talks with the Lankan President, Rupatunga. Srikant and team race against time to prevent a deadly attack on the two premiers.

name: Aashram
description: A duplicitous, aashram based, Indian Godman's good deeds serve activities criminal and unholy, such as rapes, murders, drugs, vote bank politics and forced male emasculation. The law and a few crusaders investigate to bring him to account.

episodes.name: Pran Pratishtha
episodes.description: Pammi, the wrestling champion has always faced discrimination and tried her best to raise her voice against the system for the discrimination she has been a victim of, but to no avail. But then, like a ray of hope, Baba Nirala comes to her in the form of a saviour. And then, a body is dug out from a construction site in a forest. Stream the full episode of the latest Hindi web series Ashram online on MX Player!

episodes.name: Grih Pravesh
episodes.description: The whole town is in rage when the skeleton is discovered in the forest and Chief Minister Sunderlal’s name comes up in the case. Sub Inspector Ujagar SIngh is assigned to the case and he has to reach the root of the matter. Pammi, on the other hand, is drawn to the magic of Baba Nirala’s devotion! episodes.name: Duh Swapna
episodes.description: Pammi has decided to give up her career as a wrestler and follow the path of devotion and salvation under the guidance of Baba Nirala. She is highly impressed by the work Baba has done for the poor and the outcastes. Meanwhile the subinector Ujagar SIngh is probing the case of the skeleton. Will he find any lead in the case? episodes.name: Sewa Daar
episodes.description: Baba has allowed Pammi to join the ashram as a sadhvi, but when her brother also shows interest to join the ashram, Baba is skeptical of him. While investigating the case of the skeleton, Ujagar Singh gets pushed towards the ashram and suspects some illegal activities going on there. With the growing popularity of Baba, CM is also inclined to find out his background. Will any secret information be revealed from Baba’s past? Stay tuned on MX Player to watch the latest Bobby Deol series Ashram online!

episodes.name: Amrit Sudha
episodes.description: Baba Nirala has organized the event of Mass Marriage in the ashram, where Satti would be one of the grooms. The event is attended by Hukum Singh, who offers Baba a luring deal to participate in the upcoming elections. Ujagar Singh makes progress on the case when the skeleton gets identified by a girl and the story unfolds. Will Baba now enter the world of politics and accept Hukum Singh’s deal? Ashram, the latest Hindi show streaming on MX Player now!

episodes.name: Vish Haran
episodes.description: Baba comes to know about I.G. Sharma’s investigation on him after the CMs orders and he lays a trap for him, to which he falls prey. Sub Inspector Ujagar Singh in his investigation has led him to a lead inside the ashram named Kavita, but it is impossible to reach her or talk to her. Will Kavita take the risk to contact someone outside the ashram? New Hindi web show Ashram full episodes, star cast, storyline, videos & more available on MX Player for free.

episodes.name: Gati Rodh
episodes.description: Ujagar SIngh has dug too deep into the secrets of the ashram and he suspects that he might be near a big breakthrough. But then, he receives a call ordering him to stop the investigation on the case immediately and to not to pursue the case further. Bhopa, on the other hand receives shocking information about someone they had been following. Will Ujagar Singh give up the case? Watch the full MX Originals’ latest web series Ashram in HIndi On MX Player for free!

episodes.name: Shuddhi Karan
episodes.description: Baba Nirala wants more support from the younger generation and for this, he calls the famous pop star Tinka Singh to arrange a music show in the ashram which he refuses flatly and also insults Bhopa. Meanwhile, Babita’s looks have created an impression on Baba and he tries to remove Satti from his way. What will Baba do now with Satti and pop star Tinka Singh? All the episodes of the Hindi web show Ashram available on MX Player without signing up. Watch now!

episodes.name: Maha Prasad
episodes.description: All the efforts of Ujagar Singh to continue the investigation have failed. He approaches his friend S. P. Dhandha and the two together decide to pursue the case in secret without letting anyone know. Inside the ashram, Satti has decided to do Shuddhikaran and is being transferred to somewhere else. Babita is shattered on learning this, and then late at night, she is called by Baba to his private quarters. Do not go anywhere, watch the full Hindi web series Ashram for free online on MX Player!

episodes.name: Triya - Charit
episodes.description: Tinka Singh is ready to organise the concert in Baba Kashipur Wala’s ashram. Tinka Singh’s concert in the ashram is a major buzz event and turns many heads towards the ashram. After the massive hit, the ashram comes into the public light and this is the best time for both CM Sunderlal and Ex-CM Hukum Singh, to make the most of it. Given the upcoming elections, the ashram soon becomes the epicentre of political discourse. While this happens during the day, baba Nirala makes sure to keep his nights busy as well

episodes.name: Chhadma - Vesh
episodes.description: After getting what he craves the most, baba is impressed with Babita and he makes sure to show it. He orders the Sadhvi mata to let Babita perform the morning aarti every day. On the other hand, as the Tinka Singh concert becomes a massive hit and the subsequent events are even more cheered on, the demand for the narcotics has risen dramatically in the ashram premises. To meet the demand, Bhopa asks his assistant to buy more drugs. In a big win, inspector Ujagar along with Sadhu are able to pose as substance abusers and register in the aashram to carry out their investigation. Will Ujagar and Sadhu succeed in their mission?

episodes.name: Naag - Paash
episodes.description: Baba Nirala takes CM Sunderlal to his Satsang. He also manages to make Babita strategically talk about how the ashram has given her a second life and transformed the lives of her and many other women like her. At the wrestling competition, the public demands baba to have a mock wrestle with Pammi. The latter understands that there is more than what meets the eyes and senses discomfort. What will she do now? Will she be convinced of baba’s real intentions? Will Ujagar and Sadhu be able to gather enough information before getting caught?

episodes.name: Mrig - Trishna
episodes.description: After having wrestled with her, Pammi becomes the object of Baba Nirala’s next obsession. Next day, Pammi wakes up in pain and withers knowing that she has been molested, but remains unaware about who is behind the disgusting act. Akki makes friends with Sanober and decides to take her help in trapping Sunny. Will Pammi come to know about her perpetrator? Will Akki succeed in his plan to trap Sunny?

episodes.name: Kaliya - Mardan
episodes.description: Inspector Ujagar and Sadhu are able to get a big win as they click pictures of the drug racket inside the ashram. On the other hand, oblivion the reality, a naive Pammi reaches the chambers of baba to inform him about being grotesquely assaulted in an unconscious condition. Baba Nirala assures her that he will order Bhopa to find her culprit as soon as possible. Will Ujagar’s cover finally be revealed? Will someone come to his rescue?

episodes.name: Chhadma - Yudhha
episodes.description: Everyone in the ashram is taken by shock when they hear about sudden death in the ashram. Pammi calls her brother, Satti to inform him about her health but Babita takes the call instead and assures Satti that Pammi would be fine soon. Kavita tries to warn Pammi about Baba Nirala’s true face and tells her that he must be her culprit, but Pammi dismisses her. Ex-CM Hukum Singh takes on a public rally to demean the alliance of Baba Nirala and the current CM for his political gain. How will this end for him? Will Pammi see Baba’s truth?

episodes.name: Moh - Bhang
episodes.description: After collecting enough evidence against Baba Nirala and proving all the illegal activities that are undertaken in the ashram, Natasha and Ujagar Singh hand over the file to the SP Dhanda. The SP uses the information to his benefits and gives the file to the CM in return for a much earlier promised transfer to Delhi. Pammi is determined to find out about baba’s truth and so she pretends to be intoxicated and unconscious. At the same time, Pammi’s father is on his way to meet her when he meets with an accident. Will Pammi be able to voice out the truth of baba? Will the CM expose Baba Nirala and his ashram?

episodes.name: Koot - Neeti
episodes.description: Satti is on his way to the hospital after getting the news of his father’s accident. Pammi reaches the hospital too. She understands that Bhopa is behind her father’s accident and he has done it so that she keeps quiet about Baba Nirala’s real intentions. Pammi is also upset with Babita and confronts her about not telling her the truth of Baba Nirala. Having enough information to destroy the ashram, CM Sunderlal orders a raid on Baba Nirala’s ashram after not getting any cooperation from him. Baba Nirala is placed under house arrest.

episodes.name: Chakra - Vaat
episodes.description: Pammi devises a plan to keep a close eye on the guards and entry and exit points of the ashram. Right before the elections, Baba Nirala delivers the most awaited news and announces his alliance with Hukum Singh’s party in the upcoming elections. Baba Nirala is now promoted from messiah to a kingmaker in the eyes of the general public. While everyone is drowned in celebration, Pammi manages to run away and break free. Will CM Sunderlal expose Baba Nirala after losing the election? With public sentiment, political leanings and his followers by his side, Baba Nirala has now risen to immense power in the state. Will he ever see a downfall?

episodes.name: Indra Prastha
episodes.description: With Hukum Singh coming to power as the Chief Minister of the state, Kashipur wale Baba Nirala has now emerged victorious as a King Maker. On the other hand, Hukum Singh feels powerless as only a handful of his supporters have been sworn in as ministers because Aashram is taking its own time to finalize the portfolios. The string of celebrations for victory at the elections continue - at the new and magnificent NIRALA DHAAM, but Baba Nirala seems far away from being content with all this glory. The Forces of Aashram and the state Government are constantly in search of Pammi, who had managed to escape from Aashram and is still on the run. Baba is restless and wants her back at any cost!

episodes.name: Chakravyuh
episodes.description: A massive operation is mounted at Bodhi Ghat in order to nab Pammi. Aashram organizes a grand funeral for Satti and his father Gurusharan. Pammi and Akki are eventually spotted and attacked but amidst massive security and surveillance they manage to escape. Baba rages at Michael and Bhopa who tried to eliminate Pammi. Baba wants her alive and scratch free! Sadhvi Mata knows the perfect solution for Baba’s distress. She manages to coax the teenage daughter of the Dahiyas, and takes her to a Farmhouse where Baba is alone. On political front, Dilawar confronts Hukum and Bhopa as he feels betrayed for not being offered the Revenue Ministry. Babita grabs this opportunity and makes him an offer!

episodes.name: Charan Kamal
episodes.description: A tense atmosphere spreads across Aashram when a young sewadar, from the Bada Mahulla community suddenly collapses during the Prabhat aarti at Dhyansthal, due to drug overdose. Komal spills the truth to her parents of being molested by Baba. Vipul Dahiya struggles to accept this dark truth as a lot is at stake. On the other hand, Baba and Bhopa decide to expand their drugs Business. Tinka and rocky help them set up their own Poppy Production.Pammi watches the news of her relatives being tortured in the village by the police, this breaks her heart. In the middle of the night, when Akki is fast asleep, Pammi goes to her heavily guarded village in order to surrender herself!

episodes.name: Guru Dakshina
episodes.description: Komal and her mother try to lodge an FIR against Baba Nirala but SHO Haridas, dissuades them from doing so. Ujagar reaches out to the Dahiyas and offers to help them get Justice. Soon things go downhill and Vipul Dahiya finds himself in a fix in his battle to protect his daughter. Ujagar on other hand leaves no stone unturned in his investigation and prepares a water tight case against Baba Nirala. Bhopa sacks I.G Chauhan due to his incompetence - Bhopa finds the perfect solution to control Ujagar and Natasha - He gets Natasha’s Ex husband appointed as the DIG in Kashipur.

episodes.name: Kaam Vatika
episodes.description: After losing his girlfriend Natasha and the water-tight case of the Dahiyas, a devastated Ujagar goes to visit his family. This visit opens a new door for Ujagar and he joins the Intelligence Bureau (IB). Pammi accuses Babita of selling herself to Baba Nirala. Hukum Singh’s special friend Sonia Hirawat, a big shot Image maker from London, arrives to help Hukum create a new Image for the Pradesh, but soon she learns who the real King is! Sonia decides to make the most of this opportunity for herself and Hukum as well.

episodes.name: Swarg Lok
episodes.description: Baba’s vision of creating his own ‘Swarg Lok’ starts turning into a reality as Sonia executes a grand event where Baba takes avatar as BHAGWAN NIRALA. A new threat for Aashram rises from the Jungle of Karara as Ex-C.M Sunderlal manages to provoke the naxals who are against the encroachment of their forest land. As Bhagwan’s popularity spreads across the globe, Pammi gets more restless and decides to kill Baba. This reckless act of Pammi once again puts her and Akki’s life in Danger.

episodes.name: Halahal
episodes.description: Bhopa offers Tinka a seat in Hukum Singh’s Cabinet. Baba turns down Banno’s demand of making their underage son a minister. Unwilling to give up, Banno approaches Hukum Singh, who makes her a better offer! Meanwhile Pammi and Akki who have taken shelter in a Basti, start posting letters to various Government authorities in order to seek justice. In the drugs investigation against Aashram, Ujagar and his boss Avinash Dubey are able to crack a link. After arresting the big broker Harry Ahuja, they succeed in arresting Tinka and Rocky, who are directly linked to Aashram and this illegal business

episodes.name: Kuchakra
episodes.description: Ujagar’s investigation once again comes to a dead end after Tinka and Rocky are transferred to Judicial custody on the orders of the court. Bhopa gets the letters traced and raids the Basti to catch Pammi and Akki. In a rescue operation set up by Ujagar, Pammi and Akki safely escape to Delhi border. Pammi and Akki take shelter in outskirts of Delhi and with the help of Akki’s friend, Ravindra Rawat, they approach various News Channels to break Pammi’s story to the world.

episodes.name: Shankh Naad
episodes.description: Trouble rises for Bhagwan Nirala as Akki manages to hack a popular TV Channel and Pammi’s video spreads like fire. Sonia immediately springs into action to do the damage control. District Judge Rastogi, who also saw Pammi’s video, takes cognizance of the matter and Bhagwan is summoned to appear in Court. Sunderlal grabs this opportunity and announces his support for Pammi. On the other hand pressure mounts on Hukum to get the district Judge transferred.

episodes.name: Mahabhiyog
episodes.description: Sunderlal makes a deal with Baba which causes trouble for Hukum Singh as his Cabinet protests in ‘No Confidence’ vote . Banno comes to the rescue of Hukum and unfurls the past of Baba and Bhopa. She hands him the original FIR copies of cases on Monty Singh and Bhopa. Sunderlal’s lawyers back-out right before the hearing date but Ujagar manages to get a female activist lawyer Sunita, to fight Pammi’s case in the Court. The trial takes an unexpected turn when Bhagwan claims he is incapable of having sex as he has been castrated!

name: Taaza Khabar
description: A public toilet caretaker's poverty-stricken life takes a drastic U-turn when he helps an old woman. How long will fate smile upon him?

episodes.name: Khabardaar
episodes.description: Vasya's slum-dog life is an uphill struggle. His only respite, and lady love, is Madhu, a sex worker. One day, his kindness gets rewarded when he receives an old lady's blessings.

episodes.name: Vardaan
episodes.description: Only Vasya's friend Peter believes in him, and they set out to exploit his newfound power and try to sell a vintage vase. Will their first mission make them the kings of the city?

episodes.name: Azaadi
episodes.description: Helping a contestant win a live game show does not work the way Vasya and Peter wanted, but all's not lost. He frees Madhu from the brothel, but will the lovers live in peace?

episodes.name: Kismat
episodes.description: Betting on an upcoming cricket tournament, the team start earning big bucks. But, as Vasya eyes his mother's dream villa, the city has eyes on him, just like the police.

episodes.name: Baazi
episodes.description: Vasya begins to distrust his team and fears for his mother's life. During a surprise romantic dinner, he proposes to Madhu. But, before she can say yes, her past catches up.

episodes.name: Shraap
episodes.description: Vasya's dream of owning the villa comes true, and his mother and team move in. However, his blessing turns into a curse as this kind-hearted man slowly becomes a megalomaniac.

episodes.name: Hisaab
episodes.description: Peter recounts the last interaction he had with Vasya. While Vasya's loved ones deal with his loss, a new enemy makes their life a living hell.

episodes.name: Waapsi
episodes.description: Vasya's life hits the reset button as he turns to Taaza Khabar to repay Yusuf's losses but with a sly plan to outwit his nemesis this time.

episodes.name: Vardaan 2.0
episodes.description: Madhu is glad when Vasya saves a child's life. Yusuf warns Vasya that no tricks will work on him. As the clock ticks down, Vasya is hit with a game-changing Taaza Khabar.

episodes.name: Sab Dhuan
episodes.description: Vasya and his team navigate the twists of a revamped Taaza Khabar when an old ally unexpectedly re-enters their lives. The events that follow change everything forever.

episodes.name: Aakhri Daav
episodes.description: Vasya, a changed man, receives his most joyful Taaza Khabar yet. Reignited by a new lease on life, he's determined to settle the score with Yusuf once and for all.

episodes.name: Aapki Marzi
episodes.description: Vasya and Yusuf meet face to face - no escape, no turning back. Will Vasya conquer the seemingly invincible Yusuf or fall to his greatest foe?

name: Mirzapur
description: The iron-fisted Akhandanand Tripathi is a millionaire carpet exporter and the mafia don of Mirzapur. His son, Munna, is an unworthy, power-hungry heir who will stop at nothing to inherit his father's legacy. An incident at a wedding procession forces him to cross paths with Ramakant Pandit, an upstanding lawyer, and his sons, Guddu and Bablu. It snowballs into a game of ambition, power and greed that threatens the fabric of this lawless city.

episodes.name: JHANDU
episodes.description: A shocking incident at a wedding procession ignites a series of events entangling the lives of two families in the lawless city of Mirzapur.

episodes.name: GOODA
episodes.description: Guddu and Bablu have a life-altering choice to make. Munna gets a lesson in loyalty. A new, diabolical contender for Mirzapur emerges.

episodes.name: WAFADAR
episodes.description: A generation-old rivalry is rekindled.

episodes.name: VIRGINITY
episodes.description: Akhandanand tests the boys' moral fibre, leading them down a path of no return. And Sweety must choose between Munna and Guddu.

episodes.name: BHAUKAL
episodes.description: Guddu and Bablu hatch an ambitious plan to increase the gun trade, but for this, both the cops and criminals of Mirzapur must cooperate.

episodes.name: BARFI
episodes.description: A meeting of the mafia heads of Purvanchal masquerading as a Holi party leads to a fracas' that threatens to transform all equations.

episodes.name: LIONS OF MIRZAPUR
episodes.description: Guddu and Bablu have come into their own in their private and professional lives as gangsters. But is it time for a rethink?

episodes.name: TANDAV
episodes.description: Tempers reach a head between Guddu and Bablu while they're in exile. And it's time for the Mr. Purvanchal contest.

episodes.name: YOGYA
episodes.description: Three generations of Tripathis show the world who they really are.

episodes.name: DHENKUL
episodes.description: The Gorakhpur wedding massacre is a thing of the past for Akhandanand Tripathi. His focus is now on the present - the business and conquering larger territory to remain the King of Mirzapur. Everyone who survived that violent night has come out a different person. Despite horrific memories, they know that survival is their only option.

episodes.name: KHARGOSH
episodes.description: The Tripathis, still unaware that Guddu and Golu are alive, continue to form new alliances. Munna impresses Bauji and Akhandanand with the way he has handled a negotiation. Akhandanand helps the Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh close the wedding massacre chapter. Guddu, Golu and Dimpy who are still in hiding, reunite with a loyal partner and set their sights on Mirzapur.

episodes.name: VIKLAANG QUOTA
episodes.description: Akhandanand’s woes in the bedroom lead him to the doors of a sexologist. Beena continues to be gripped by the traumatic incident she endured but finds a compelling reason to survive. Guddu has to push himself to think beyond his physical strength while Golu has to learn the ropes of the trade. They make use of Dimpy’s past friendship and end up sending the Tripathis a strong message.

episodes.name: BHAYMUKT
episodes.description: Guddu and Golu are still not a threat to Akhandanand, but Munna thinks differently. Akhandanand assigns Munna to take charge of youth canvassing in the state along with the CM’s daughter, Madhuri Yadav. Beena safeguards a big secret. Guddu and Golu’s alliance with Lala begins to affect Akhandanand’s business. Golu decides to get Robin’s expertise. Sharad’s emotions overpower his thought process.

episodes.name: LANGDA
episodes.description: Akhandanand reprimands Munna and Sharad for their impulsive actions. Bablu’s diary becomes a key in learning secrets about the Tripathi family for Golu. In order to impress Akhandanand Tripathi, Sharad introduces him and Munna to one of Bihar’s most powerful business family, the Tyagis. A fortunate coincidence triggers an unexpected alliance between parties that have a common goal.

episodes.name: ANKUSH
episodes.description: There has been a huge setback in the Tripathi family’s business, Akhandanand smells a rat but uses this set back to his advantage. Munna is coerced in to taking a big step in his life which makes the Tripathis’ political alliances stronger. Ramakant is surprised to find an unexpected ally. Golu makes a business proposition to Shatrughan, but it falls through. The elections come to an end.

episodes.name: OOD BILAAV
episodes.description: Guddu and Golu are growing from strength to strength, Guddu strives to become the bahubali of Balia. On the personal front, Guddu is getting closer to Shabnam, who asks him to let go of the past. Shatrugan doesn’t have the same influence in his family as his elder brother, a fact that Golu notices and uses to her advantage. The wheels of a Adventuretic political coup are set in to motion.

episodes.name: CHAUCHAK
episodes.description: Sharad Shukla and JP Yadav successfully manage to dent Akhandanand’s political aspirations. JP Yadav then calls for a debauche celebration with Zarina in private. After suffering a significant personal loss, Guddu takes upon an unexpected responsibility and Shabnam agrees to help. Golu doesn’t take this too well as she feels Shabnam will come in the way of their larger objective.

episodes.name: BUTTERSCOTCH
episodes.description: Beena gives birth to a boy and is worried about the safety of the child. Lala is unhappy with Guddu’s closeness to Shabnam. Golu herself is in immense pain, questions what she has become. Maurya is frustrated with constant setbacks and decides to meet with the IG. Munna takes matters in his own hands when Maqbool’s lies are resurfaced. Loyalties are at stake as a repercussion of Munna’s actions.

episodes.name: KING OF MIRZAPUR
episodes.description: Beena confronts the horrors of her past, leaving the Tripathi household in chaos. Munna’s new found power through Madhuri leads him to make a drastic confrontation with Akhandanand. Dadda calls for a meeting with Mama, Shatrughan and Bharat. Ramakant is forced to confront his own beliefs. Guddu and Golu assure Beena of the promise they made. Sharad looks to bring his plan to a conclusion.

episodes.name: Tetua
episodes.description: While Ramakant is tried for the murder of SSP Maurya, Guddu and Golu's claim to the throne is questioned because Kaleen Bhaiya's body is missing. Madhuri vows to fulfill her father's mission of a crime free state.

episodes.name: Mexico
episodes.description: Guddu and Golu kickstart the business again, but are still looking for a supply of opium which would allow them to establish control over Purvanchal's underworld. In the hunt for the same control, Sharad tries to crack a deal with one of Guddu's old allies, while Madhuri tries to eliminate Guddu.

episodes.name: Pratishodh
episodes.description: Guddu cements his power over Mirzapur while Sharad finally makes a very strong ally. Golu receives a threat from Bharat. Ramakant turns down Robin's offer and faces danger in prison. Meanwhile Madhuri strategises to bring Guddu down in other ways.

episodes.name: Kekadaa
episodes.description: Ramakant's case is in danger with the appearance of a new witness. In an attempt to save her father's opium business from collapsing, Shabnam turns to Guddu for help. Meanwhile Golu gets some much awaited information about the still missing Kaleen Bhaiya.

episodes.name: Traahi
episodes.description: Golu plans an attack outside Mirzapur without Guddu. Guddu returns from Nepal to find Golu missing. Sharad senses something is amiss in Siwan and decides to shift his most guarded secret to Jaunpur.

episodes.name: Bhasmasur
episodes.description: Purvanchal is set ablaze with a gang war between Sharad and Guddu. Madhuri makes strong decisions to break the police-gangster nexus, while a ghost from the past resurfaces. Ramakant finds a purpose in prison, which catches Lala's attention.

episodes.name: Bum-pilaat
episodes.description: Purvanchal is thrown into turmoil following the shocking incident in the jail. Dadda confronts his son, while Sharad and Bharat have a fallout as well. A baithak is called to resolve the gang feud.

episodes.name: Raja Beta
episodes.description: Guddu goes down a dark downward spiral as he loses people close to him. A new judge is assigned before Ramakant's final hearing. Meanwhile, Saloni discovers her husband's secrets. IG Dubey is reinstated and is tasked with one mission: Capturing Guddu Pandit.

episodes.name: Ansh
episodes.description: Beena is compelled to find safety after the fall of Guddu. Madhuri urges Sharad to let go of the past for a better future. Will Shatrughan be able to convince Saloni to keep his secret? A broken Dimpy wants to take matters into her own hands.

episodes.name: Pratibimbh
episodes.description: Golu returns to Mirzapur only to discover the chaos that ensued in her absence. Madhuri inaugurates Aam Bagh despite the threat of JP Yadav looming large. As Dussehra closes in, there is only one question: Who will ascend the throne of Mirzapur?

name: Maamla Legal Hai
description: Chaos collides with the letter of the law at District Court Patparganj, where quirky employees work to uphold justice — but not without a few objections.

episodes.name: Egregious
episodes.description: Tyagi seeks key support in his campaign for bar president. Harvard grad Anaya Shroff struggles to find her footing… and a desk.

episodes.name: Darwaza
episodes.description: Ananya looks to assist a mysterious advocate in his cases. Trouble brews for Tyagi's nomination when someone complains about his bold signboard.

episodes.name: Dignity
episodes.description: When a monkey causes a stir on the court premises, the lawyers are moved to strike, leading to a strain on Ananya and her first case.

episodes.name: Aukaat
episodes.description: Sujata tries to drop her “foyer lawyer” status with a new client — a foul-mouthed parrot. When a big-shot lawyer arrives, Tyagi and Bagai hatch a plan.

episodes.name: Touch
episodes.description: Ananya and Sujata scramble to help an inmate fulfill her dream to start a family. Tyagi has an emotional talk with his father, a retired judge.

episodes.name: Biradari
episodes.description: Tyagi and his campaign land in hot water after police and lawyers clash. Ananya and Sujata contend with a fierce woman in the race.

episodes.name: Kutai
episodes.description: Phorey or Tyagi? The election results are finally in — but the twists aren't over yet. Ananya turns counselor for a young woman’s case.

episodes.name: Law vs Justice
episodes.description: Tyagi weighs an important decision that will change the course of his career. PP Sahab and Ananya are pulled into a landmark case.

name: The Golden Spoon
description: Would you trade your poor but loving family for a life of riches? When Seung Cheon gets his hands on a magical spoon that allows him to switch lives with his rich best friend, he thinks it’s a no-brainer. But life-altering decisions are always accompanied by a sense of doubt, and with only three chances to change his mind, Seung Cheon has to decide which of his two possible futures is worth keeping.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.description: Dirt spoon' Seung-cheon gets a hold of a mysterious golden spoon that can change his parents.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Seung-cheon becomes Hwang Tae-yong with the spoon, but the real Tae-yong finds himself in trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Seung-cheon learns that there is a rule about the golden spoon that the old woman did not tell him.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.description: Seung-cheon is worried that he might be found out, and a third person appears and puts him in danger.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.description: Seung-cheon decides to return to "Lee Seung-cheon" after hearing the news that Cheol might die.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.description: Despite confirming his love with Ju-hee, Seung-cheon decides to return to Hwang Tae-yong.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.description: Seung-cheon discovers more secrets about the real Tae-yong while helping his poor family.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.description: Seung-cheon is shocked that Tae-yong may have killed President Na, and that he may take all the blame.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.description: Seung-cheon returns to Korea ten years later and is reunited with Ju-hee.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.description: Seung-cheon agrees to be interviewed by Ju-hee, only because he wants to see her again.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.description: Ju-hee and Seung-cheon grow closer, and Tae-yong is getting closer to the secret of the golden spoon.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.description: Tae-yong meets the old woman. After learning everything, he decides to get his old life back.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.description: Seung-cheon returns to his original self, and contemplates how to return to Hwang Tae-yong.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.description: Hyeon-do hides the fact that he also used a golden spoon and welcomes Seung-cheon as "Hwang Tae-yong".

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.description: Through the death of Cheol, Seung-cheon regrets his past choices and makes a new resolution.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.description: Seung-cheon, who has become a suspect in the murder, struggles to find a way to convict Hyeon-do.

name: Live Telecast
description: A TV crew goes to a haunted house, where a family lives, to create a new live show that captures ghost on camera, only to be trapped inside with no way of getting out.

episodes.name: The Introduction
episodes.description: Retelling real-life paranormal stories is what Jenny and her team does best, and their show, Dark Tales, is proof of that. But the otherworldly may be closer than they think.

episodes.name: The Failure
episodes.description: Dark Tales faces a crisis, but its team won't go away without a fight. Meanwhile, a secret from Sekar's past shows Jenny a way ahead.

episodes.name: The Prep
episodes.description: Once Dark Tales is axed and Jenny sells her idea to the channel, the team settles on a haunted house in Yelagiri. Enter Shenbagam and her two children.

episodes.name: The Show
episodes.description: Lights, camera, live! Shenbagam recounts her experiences in the house, and Jenny uses special effects to keep the viewers hooked. But one of the extra actors is just not ordinary.

episodes.name: The Trap
episodes.description: The unthinkable happens while the world watches. When the crew tries to escape their ordeal, something is hell-bent on keeping them inside the house.

episodes.name: The Escape
episodes.description: ACP Guru tries his best to help the trapped crew but in vain. Finally, Jenny reaches the end of her tether and makes a compromise.

episodes.name: The Climax
episodes.description: The culprit responsible for everyone's misery makes his appearance, and he has no intention of letting anyone go. However, Sekar is the only one who can stop him.

name: Kerala Crime Files: Shiju, Parayil Veedu, Neendakara
description: A sex worker's mysterious and gruesome murder in a suburban lodge called "Grand Tourist Home" baffles the police as the only lead they have is a fake address.

episodes.name: Day 1 - Crime Scene
episodes.description: A sex worker, Swapna, is found dead in a run down lodge in Kochi. Circle Inspector Kurian and Sub-Inspector Manoj  from the North police station begin their investigation.

episodes.name: Day 2 - Mahazar
episodes.description: The investigation crew learns that only the receptionist, Sharath, has seen the culprit. With Sharath's help, Manoj tries to get Shiju's sketch made."

episodes.name: Day 3 - Detection
episodes.description: Swapna's roommate, Lathika, reveals to Manoj about meeting Shiju. The SI connects the dots after she tells him about Shiju's cruelty.

episodes.name: Day 4 - Findings
episodes.description: The police expand their search to the other lodges in Kochi after Manoj and his team figure out that Shiju has a practice of meeting sex workers in such places.

episodes.name: Day 5 - Evidence
episodes.description: The investigative team learns about Star Shiju, a name derived from the hotel he worked at. They set out to explore Shiju's roots

episodes.name: Day 6 - Charge Sheet
episodes.description: Kurian, Manoj and their team have been chasing Shiju all over. But how long can a man hide away if he is genuinely in love?

name: Jamtara – Sabka Number Ayega
description: A group of small-town young men run a lucrative phishing operation, until a corrupt politician wants in on their scheme -- and a cop wants to fight it.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.description: The successful phishing scams of Rocky, Sunny and their friends pique a corrupt local politician’s interest. Tension brews between Rocky and Sunny.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: An attempt to arrest the young men is thwarted, to the dismay of the ambitious new police superintendent. Sunny brings a proposal to Gudiya’s mother.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Dolly seeks a cybercrime officer’s help in her case. As some of the guys side with Sunny, Rocky plans revenge. An intrusion disrupts Sunny’s wedding.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.description: Sunny's father comes to his aid. Brajesh wields his power. As Saurav educates the police on phishing, Sunny and Gudiya conduct a training of their own.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.description: When Gudiya’s coaching classroom is burned down, Sunny considers drastic retaliation. A slipped note leads Dolly and Saurav to a deserted warehouse.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.description: The boys adopt Sunny’s get-rich-quick strategy. Anas looks to break a story in the paper. As Sunny’s confidence grows, Brajesh visits him and Gudiya.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.description: Dolly, Biswa and Saurav carry out a sting operation that goes awry. Sunny arrives at Brajesh's party, vowing payback for his treatment of Gudiya.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.description: A tragedy sends Sunny on the run, with the police and Brajesh’s men on his trail. Dolly and Saurav hatch a plan to prove Brajesh’s link to the incident.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.description: An enemy intercepts Sunny’s escape. While tracking the phishing calls, Saurav makes a breakthrough. As some scammers are arrested, Sunny’s fate worsens.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.description: Sunny acquiesces to a dubious deal to save his father. A shattered Gudiya partners with Dolly to set a honey trap in hopes of finally capturing Brajesh.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.description: As elections approach in Jamtara, Gudiya takes a stand against Brajesh. Rocky looks to start fresh, and Sunny concocts a new scam.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Before arriving in Jamtara, a dating app scam lands Rinku in trouble, while the beginnings of Gudiya's political career are revealed.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Dolly and Saurav return to Jamtara to investigate a major phishing case. A group of schoolchildren are assembled to carry out Sunny’s new scam.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.description: While speaking at a rally, Gudiya encounters a masked gunman. Dolly faces pressure to crack the case, while a crooked journalist is handed a scoop.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.description: Rinku is devastated after a loss. A raid on Brajesh’s property uncovers incriminating evidence. Biswa witnesses a shocking event.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.description: A sudden police press conference blindsides Dolly, Saurav and Biswa. Brajesh pays a visit to the chief minister, while Rocky opens a new shop.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.description: The scammers’ wives join Gudiya’s operation, while a mob attack leads to a brutal assault. Saurav makes a big discovery in Noida.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.description: Ahead of election day, Sunny, Gudiya and Rocky devise a scheme to woo voters. Brajesh learns the abductor’s identity, while Rinku is caught in a web.

name: Kota Factory
description: In a city of coaching centers known to train India’s finest collegiate minds, an earnest but unexceptional student and his friends navigate campus life.

episodes.name: Inventory
episodes.description: Hoping to pass the IIT entrance exams, teen Vaibhav arrives in Kota with one goal: to nab a seat at the best coaching center in the city.

episodes.name: Assembly Line
episodes.description: Canteen food, insomnia and studying weigh on Vaibhav, but when his friends’ tips don’t help, Professor Jeetu offers his campus-life survival strategies.

episodes.name: Optimization
episodes.description: Struggling with Inorganic Chemistry, Vaibhav plots to have his instructor replaced, but his problem with the subject may not be the person teaching it.

episodes.name: Shutdown
episodes.description: Given several days off before exams begin, Vaibhav, Meena and Uday each use the revision period to pursue romantic possibilities, with mixed results.

episodes.name: Overhaul
episodes.description: Standing at a crossroads in his academic journey, Vaibhav is torn between his heart and his mind before making a big decision about his next steps.

episodes.name: Reasoning
episodes.description: With their new classes off to a bleak start, Vaibhav and his peers question the value of the IIT dream and seek inspiration from a trusted source.

episodes.name: Control System
episodes.description: Struggling with Physics, Vaibhav attempts to bend the rules to attend Jeetu’s classes. Meena frets that teenage hormones will get the best of him.

episodes.name: Atmospheric Pressure
episodes.description: Jeetu searches for staff for his institute, making some reluctant choices along the way. Filled with self-doubt, Vartika evades practice tests at Aimers.

episodes.name: Repair & Maintenance
episodes.description: When a bout of jaundice slows Vaibhav down in his studying, Jeetu insists he calls his only hope to get well quickly: his mother.

episodes.name: Packaging
episodes.description: JEE results send Kota into celebration mode and give Vaibhav, Meena and Uday glimpses into their own futures, but the occasion comes with sad truths.

episodes.name: Mission Statement
episodes.description: Jeetu struggles to cope with the loss of a student. Vaibhav doubts his own path to success when his cricket-playing cousin visits Kota.

episodes.name: Fault Mitigation
episodes.description: Facing financial stress, Meena begins tutoring an eager student to earn extra cash. Vaibhav's attitude forces Vartika to find a new study partner.

episodes.name: Benchmarking
episodes.description: A clash with Gagan causes Jeetu to spiral. Shivangi feels the strain of the NEET prep, while Vaibhav and Meena compete for ranks in a test series.

episodes.name: Emergency Response
episodes.description: Jeetu receives an offer that affects the future of Aimers. Uday’s error in judgment leads to serious trouble. Exam pressure takes its toll on Vaibhav.

episodes.name: Product Delivery
episodes.description: Prayers and prep take hold as the final countdown to the exam approaches. Jeetu makes a startling announcement to his students.

name: Hostel Daze
description: Four naive and vulnerable wing-mates develop lasting bonds as they jostle hard to survive the first semester in a hostel. Peppered with absurdities, chutzpahs, clashes and debacles inherent to hostel life, 'Hostel Daze' depicts the grill that every Indian hostel-resident goes through.

episodes.name: Intro
episodes.description: Ankit Pandey enters hostel to ﬁnd that the room allotted to him is already occupied by Chirag and Jaat. He has to ﬁnd himself a room, and a bed that too in the ragging period.

episodes.name: Proving Identity
episodes.description: Ankit grapples with identity crisis as he ﬁnds himself pretty ordinary amongst his batch-mates.

episodes.name: F.O.S.L.A
episodes.description: Ankit is smitten by Akanksha, the most prized catch of not only his batch but entire college. Will a coy Ankit succeed?

episodes.name: GPL
episodes.description: Ankit tries to hide his birthday from his wing-mates to avoid the dreaded GPL. Will he succeed?

episodes.name: End Sem
episodes.description: With Chirag suddenly gone unavailable at the last moment, Ankit and Jhantoo have to survive the end-sems.

episodes.name: D.I.S.C.O
episodes.description: The gang is a year older and realises their authoritative role as seniors not realising that “breaking ice” with the juniors could land them into trouble.

episodes.name: Love-Square
episodes.description: We have all been through love triangles. But when Jaat and Jhantoo end up falling for the same girl a love square is formed. With Ankit and Chirag as catalysts, both pursue Unnati, the heartthrob of the hostel.

episodes.name: Gandagi
episodes.description: Ankit does everything in his power to woo Akanksha by showing her how clean he is in a typical dirty boys hostel. Akanksha however doesn’t seem impressed leaving Ankit heartbroken.

episodes.name: Ghar Wapsi
episodes.description: The gang is all prepared to leave for their homes during the break except for Jhantoo who must stay back. Through the course of the days the boys discover if home is the place to stay or hostel, the place to be.

episodes.name: Failed Experiments
episodes.description: In order to make their lives exciting in third year, the group put themselves through a series of experiments.

episodes.name: Wing Chor
episodes.description: Chirag turns detective to find a notorious thief in the hostel, meanwhile someone spills Akanksha’s secrets to her mother.

episodes.name: Lights Camera Cut
episodes.description: The team led by Chirag, gears up to make a short film in order to win the inter-hostel competition.

episodes.name: Dosti Ka Udhar
episodes.description: The group gets divided as a dispute ensues between two friends messing up their friendship.

episodes.name: G.S.H.A
episodes.description: Jhantoo contests election against a worthy opponent for the post of General Secretary of Hostel Affairs.

episodes.name: Dear Seniors
episodes.description: As the year ends, the group prepares to bid a final goodbye to their seniors, also introspecting their own relationships.

episodes.name: Single Room
episodes.description: As the seniors are allotted single rooms in the hostel, the gang refuses to get serious about their final year until reality hits them in the form of an unexpected event.

episodes.name: Curriculum Vitae
episodes.description: Ankit struggles to write his CV while Chirag and Nabomita have a difficult time keeping their relationship a secret.

episodes.name: Compromise
episodes.description: Jhantu tries to focus on his placements preparation but ends up getting involved in a hostel fight

episodes.name: Day Zero
episodes.description: Day Zero of placement is here and its a testing time for the group.

episodes.name: The Offer
episodes.description: Tensions rise high as the placement season is in it’s full swing and the gang must give it all to leave the hostel with a job in hand.

episodes.name: Hostel Departure
episodes.description: It's the end of a journey where everyone gets to say their final goodbyes to their beloved hostel. But each person does it in their own way.

name: Panchayat
description: Panchayat is a comedy-drama, which captures the journey of an engineering graduate Abhishek, who for lack of a better job option joins as secretary of a panchayat office in a remote village of Uttar Pradesh. Stuck between crazy villagers and a difficult village lifestyle Abhishek starts his job with the sole motivation of getting out of there as soon as possible, for which he even prepares for CAT.

episodes.name: Gram Panchayat Phulera
episodes.description: An unwilling Abhishek Tripathi reaches Phulera to join as panchayat secretary of the village panchayat office. However, his first day at work turns out to be far worse than what he imagined.

episodes.name: Bhootha Ped
episodes.description: As frequent power cuts hamper Abhishek's CAT preparation, he decides to take the matter in his own hands. Little did he know what he's up against.

episodes.name: Chakke Wali Kursi
episodes.description: To make his life easier Abhishek buys a new comfortable chair, which has "wheels". In the process, he unknowingly ends up disrupting the panchayat office's power balance.

episodes.name: Hamara Neta Kaisa Ho?
episodes.description: Under severe pressure to implement a government scheme, Abhishek pushes Pradhan Ji to make an extremely unpopular move. Will Pradhan Ji bow?

episodes.name: Computer Nahi Monitor
episodes.description: Bored with his mundane life, Abhishek decides to have a little bit of fun. But sometimes with great fun comes grave consequence.

episodes.name: Bahot Hua Samman
episodes.description: To focus on his studies, Abhishek decides to put aside his ego. But for how long?

episodes.name: Ladka Tez Hai Lekin..
episodes.description: Finally, the much-awaited CAT exam is around the corner. As Abhishek juggles between his work and studies, Pradhan Ji sees him as a potential groom for his daughter. Is he the right choice?

episodes.name: Jab Jaago Tabhi Savera
episodes.description: Demotivated by his performance in CAT, Abhishek tries to come at peace with his reality. However, motivation comes to him in the most unexpected way.

episodes.name: Naach
episodes.description: Abhishek tries to save a deal derailed by an overenthusiastic Manju Devi. Prahlad and Vikas struggle with their doubts about Abhishek and Rinki.

episodes.name: Bol Chaal Band
episodes.description: Due to lagging village development work, a political opposition starts to emerge against Pradhan Ji. Abhishek's loyalty gets tested.

episodes.name: Kranti
episodes.description: Abhishek gives pace to the village development work. But not without hindrance.

episodes.name: Tension
episodes.description: On a slow office day Abhishek and Vikas find themselves in an unusual situation. It's a big day for Pradhan's family.

episodes.name: Jaise Ko Taisa
episodes.description: Political opposition against Pradhan's family takes its final shape. Abhishek picks a side, loud and clear.

episodes.name: Aukaat
episodes.description: A desperate Pradhan Ji makes an attempt to full-fill his biggest election promise. Abhishek gets a reality check, but in a harsh way.

episodes.name: Dost Yaar
episodes.description: Abhishek questions his importance in Pradhan's team. Pradhan Ji and Manju Devi have their own dilemmas.

episodes.name: Parivaar
episodes.description: Afraid of losing the perception battle to his political opponent Pradhan Ji makes a tough call. An upset Abhishek tries to emotionally detach himself from the people around.

episodes.name: Rangbaazi
episodes.description: Pradhan's desperate attempt to prevent Abhishek's impending transfer intensifies the conflict between the Pradhan gang and the MLA. Prahlad finds it difficult to make peace with his new reality.

episodes.name: Gaddha
episodes.description: Abhishek returns with the resolve of staying away from the village politics. Fearing the loss of public reputation, Pradhan and Manju Devi need Abhishek's help to handle a rebel.

episodes.name: Ghar Ya Eent-Patthar?
episodes.description: After Bhushan senses an opportunity to attack Pradhan, Abhishek jumps into damage control mode. Prahlad doesn't like the way Pradhan uses Abhishek for political benefit.

episodes.name: Atma Manthan
episodes.description: The final blow to Pradhan's reputation comes after he gets accused of partiality in a welfare scheme implementation. Meanwhile to topple Pradhan's rule, Bhushan allies with the MLA.

episodes.name: Shanti Samjhauta
episodes.description: Manju Devi reluctantly agrees to Bhushan's proposal of entering into a peace agreement with the MLA. Abhishek too gives his nod as it's impossible to get the road built without MLA's support.

episodes.name: Chingaari
episodes.description: To fix their dented image, the Pradhan gang sets a trap to capitalize on a lethal mistake committed by the MLA. Amidst all the political chaos an unexpected news brings joy to the Pradhan gang.

episodes.name: Shola
episodes.description: Fully aware of his actions, MLA not only walks into the trap but also raises the stakes. Pradhan gang needs to walk the talk or it's all over.

episodes.name: Hamla
episodes.description: Finally, Pradhan rallies the whole Phulera behind him to fight one last battle for glory. Abhishek finds himself too deep into the murky waters of village politics and loses his objectivity.

name: Khakee: The Bihar Chapter
description: As a righteous cop pursues a merciless criminal in Bihar, he finds himself navigating a deadly chase and a moral battle mired in corruption.

episodes.name: Patra Parichay !
episodes.description: Upon arriving in Bihar, police officer Amit Lodha grapples with a tough new way of life — but when a child is kidnapped, he springs into action.

episodes.name: Chandanwa Ka Janm !
episodes.description: Chandan Mahto’s notoriety grows after a bold move. As Amit's career advances, deep-rooted social mindsets and political pressures create hurdles.

episodes.name: Amit Kaun ???
episodes.description: In the lead-up to state elections, violence breaks out. Amit stands up to political power but receives backlash. Chandan makes a new adversary.

episodes.name: Mooh Dikhai !!!
episodes.description: After a bloody massacre orchestrated by Chandan, Amit is tasked with capturing the criminal — and faces a vexing road ahead.

episodes.name: Meeta Ji Ki Love Story !!!
episodes.description: Chandan’s elusive whereabouts spark a new plan, with Amit and Ranjan using phone calls to track him. A secret tryst offers crucial clues.

episodes.name: Meeta Ji Ki Love Story Part 2
episodes.description: Amit makes a major announcement at a press meet. Chandan sets a trap with deadly consequences, while an explosive revelation stuns the team.

episodes.name: Phace to Phace !
episodes.description: The chase approaches a dramatic end, but peril lurks at every corner. The question remains: can Amit close the case, or will Chandan slip away?

name: Heeramandi: The Diamond Bazaar
description: In 1940s British India, archnemeses Mallikajaan and Fareedan are locked in a battle of succession of Heeramandi, an elite house of courtesans, while seeds of rebellion take root in the world around them.

episodes.name: Mallikajaan: The Queen of Heeramandi
episodes.description: As Mallikajaan reigns over her courtesans, rebellion grows on the streets. Alamzeb has her first brush with love. Wali shares key information with Bibbo.

episodes.name: Fareedanjaan: The Challenger Returns
episodes.description: Heartbroken by a nawab, Lajjo turns to drink and dance to win back her former lover. Mallikajaan reveals a dark secret as her past catches up with her.

episodes.name: Waheedajaan - Scarred for Life
episodes.description: The return of Fareedan to Khwabgah raises tensions as Mallikajaan schemes to cling onto her control. Waheedan makes a bold move of her own.

episodes.name: Alamzeb: The Innocent Pawn
episodes.description: As her dance debut approaches, Alam questions her place at Heeramandi. Saima unwittingly earns Mallikajaan's ire and Fareedan strikes back.

episodes.name: Tajdar: The Lover’s Dilemma
episodes.description: As Mallikajaan and the courtesans fervently search for Alam, Tajdar comes to her rescue. Meanwhile, an enraged Waheedan has a proposal for Fareedan.

episodes.name: Tajdar & Alamzeb: Nation vs. Love
episodes.description: Alam and Tajdar’s romance intensifies as a rebellion is being hatched. Mallikajaan and Fareedan uncover dark and disturbing secrets about each other.

episodes.name: Bibbojaan - Long Live the Revolution
episodes.description: Cartwright’s scheme against the courtesans unfolds. Seeking a future with Alam, Tajdar approaches Mallikajaan — but her approval comes at a price.

episodes.name: Heeramandi: The Swan Song
episodes.description: The fight for freedom reaches the steps of Heeramandi — for both the courtesans and the country. Will the battle end in victory or result in ruination?

name: Aakhri Sach
description: A bone-chilling tale that unravels the most twisted ties of fate, the trapped secrets of a family and the terrifying horrors an investigator has ever seen.

episodes.name: Breaking News: Ek Rahasya
episodes.description: Delhi wakes up to the horrific news of a family of 11 found dead. With no suicide note or evidence pointing towards domestic problems, Inspector Anya suspects murder.

episodes.name: Guilty Heart: Ek Saaya
episodes.description: One of the deceased Rajawat brothers, Bhuvan, has a tragic past that haunted him. Anya now has two possible suspects - a dead woman's fiancé and a notorious criminal gang.

episodes.name: Shadows of the Past: Vahem
episodes.description: Aman's trip to Teetari village brings out unexpected facts. While Anya's search leads to shocking details about the Rajawats, Bhuvan's tryst with destiny startles his family.

episodes.name: Blurring the Lines: Ardh Satya
episodes.description: Anya learns of the Rajawat's strange life and Bhuvan's heavy influence on them from Chamatkari Baba. Meanwhile, Aman's investigation yields surprising results.

episodes.name: Revelations: Khulasa
episodes.description: Despite their successes, the family starts facing difficulties again. Bhuvan shares his late father's 'plans' for them. Anya's discovery reveals hidden clues about the Rajawats.

episodes.name: Final Countdown: Sadhana
episodes.description: After Bhuvan tells the family about the solution to their problems, they contemplate the cost of doing it. Anya finally discovers the truth, which shakes her to the core.
