name: Poacher
description: A group of Indian Forest Service officers, NGO workers, police constables and good samaritans risk their lives trying to track down the biggest elephant ivory poachers in the history of India and bring them to justice.

episodes.name: The Confessor
episodes.description: The Confessor Aruku, a guilt-stricken man, confesses to the murder of elephants, setting a group of forest officers and NGO workers into action — hunting for justice across India.

episodes.name: The Crusader
episodes.description: The Crusader Mala and Alan crack the poachers’ call logs, which leads to their first dangerous raid on unsuspecting locals.

episodes.name: The Scapegoat
episodes.description: The Scapegoat The group closes in on the gang leader, Raaz, leading to a shocking discovery when they find him.

episodes.name: The Blind Eye
episodes.description: The Blind Eye Mala goes on her own to pursue the truth about Raaz, while Alan must mend his collapsing marriage with Achala.

episodes.name: The Kidnapping
episodes.description: The Kidnapping Alan leads an effort to kidnap a local corrupt politician - unbeknownst to Achala - while Mala must confront the true danger she’s put everyone in as the team becomes deeper ensnared in the threatening world of animal poaching.

episodes.name: The Jungle
episodes.description: The Jungle Months earlier, the poaching gang assembles and heads into the jungle for the elephant hunt; while in present day, Aruku leads Mala and her team into the jungle to retrace their steps to the crime scene.

episodes.name: The Big Fish
episodes.description: The Big Fish Racing against the clock, Mala and Alan travel to Delhi to pursue the big fish - the well-connected ivory dealer - and along the way must come up with a plan to smuggle her back to Kerala, where they have the jurisdiction to arrest her.

episodes.name: The Graveyard
episodes.description: The Graveyard Mala and her team face riotous crowds and corrupt local officials in Delhi while attempting to seize the largest cache of ivory in Indian history.

name: Scam 2003: The Telgi Story
description: It will follow the life of Telgi, born in Khanapur in the state of Karnataka, as he became the mastermind behind one of India’s most ingenious scams, which spread across 18 states and shook the entire country

episodes.name: Paisa Kamaya Nahin Banaya Jata Hain
episodes.description: A job opportunity brings Abdul Karim Telgi, a fruit seller from Khanpur, to Bombay. When he is arrested for forgery nine years later, he meets Kaushal Jhaveri in prison and joins his gum wash operation. However, fining the business unscalable, Abdul comes up with the idea to pivot into the world of stamp papers.

episodes.name: Choomantar
episodes.description: Abdul successfully begins to steal official stamp papers from trains, but needs a licence to sell them in bulk. Against Kaushal’s wishes, he uses political connections to try and acquire one from the Old Custom House but fails. To make matters worse, Kaushal, feeling betrayed, leaves Abdul’s side.

episodes.name: Khota Sikka
episodes.description: Abdul manages to acquire a license through political contacts but turns his back on the minister that helped him by allying with the new party in power. He ends up losing his license and going back to prison, where he meets a mechanic from Nashik who introduces him to the source of stamp papers - the Nashik Security Press.

episodes.name: Mubarak Ho Aapko Stamp Paper Hua Hain
episodes.description: Abdul formulates a strategy to get the management of the Nashik Press on his side and facilitates the promotion of their top bureaucrat. He gets the original machines, dyes and papers from the press and starts printing stamp papers. Although he expands his business, he soon learns that, to truly flourish, he must wipe out his biggest competitor.

episodes.name: I Love You
episodes.description: By manipulating the shutdown of the press and the supply chain of the Old Custom House, Abdul monopolizes the stamp market. His success having caught the attention of many, Abdul begins to befriend every new and bigger power in the state.

episodes.name: Abracadabra
episodes.description: Abdul grapples with the aftermath of his splurge by re-dealing with the various personnel on his payroll. However, he turns down Sheikh’s request to fund the Karnataka government's attempt to free a recently kidnapped superstar. Sheikh, in return, gets one of Abdul’s tempos caught, cornering him into making the payout. Despite the payment, Karnataka Police arrests Abdul from Ajmer.

episodes.name: Logic Ka Magic
episodes.description: An SIT is formed in Bangalore under Suryapratap Gehlot to investigate the stamp paper case. During investigation, he almost reaches Abdul’s printing press. Nevertheless, he finds ink cans and proves in court that Abdul is illegally printing stamp papers. Rattled, Abdul makes a deal with Pune officer DCP Halani to transfer him to Pune. However, Gehlot is on to Abdul.

episodes.name: Mumbai Ka King
episodes.description: Cornered, Abdul tries everything to get transferred to Maharashtra. Finally, Karnataka is forced to give in and Abdul is moved to Pune with Halani. However, Pune is only a trap to make sure Abdul keeps his mouth shut. Now desperate, Abdul makes an unprecedented move and manages to move into the fake custody of his trusted Mumbai Police. Meanwhile, due to growing political pressure in Maharashtra, a new SIT is formed under SRPF’s DIG Pramod Jaisingh.

episodes.name: Bina Daant Ka Sher
episodes.description: Jaisingh’s investigation begins and it threatens everyone involved with Abdul. When no one pays heed to his investigative report, Jaisingh and Gehlot arrest Abdul from his home and take him back to Bangalore. Jaisingh’s report is leaked to the media and suddenly, without warning, everyone – small and big – is under the spotlight.

episodes.name: Truth Serum
episodes.description: Jaisingh and Gehlot arrest Abdul’s bureaucrat and police associates in Maharashtra and Karnataka, but the politicians remain untouched. While Abdul faces a tell-all narco test, the pressure mounts and a decision is taken to dissolve the SITs. With the case transferred to a central agency and his family facing the brunt, can Abdul remain stoic, or will his resolve finally break?

name: Scam 1992: The Harshad Mehta Story
description: Set in 1980's & 90's Bombay, Scam 1992 follows the life of Harshad Mehta - a stockbroker who single-handedly took the stock market to dizzying heights & his catastrophic downfall. Being directed by National Award-winning filmmaker Hansal Mehta, the series is based on journalist Debashis Basu & Sucheta Dalal's book "The Scam".

episodes.name: Risk Se Ishq
episodes.description: By the fag end of the 70’s era, a middle-class boy from Ghatkopar finds his way into the stock market. He is Harshad Mehta. Aided by his friend, Bhushan, Harshad masters the art of jobbing. Backed by his aspirations, Harshad goes on to start his own trading account in partnership with his brother, Ashwin. Little do the brothers know what’s in store for them in the near future.

episodes.name: Cobra Killer
episodes.description: Harshad’s life goes for a toss when bankruptcy hits him hard coupled by his father’s demise. Although disturbed, Harshad does not give up but ventures into the consultancy business and sets up Growmore Consultancy. While his friend, Pranav Sheth finds him corporate clients, Bhushan is roped in to join the firm. Armed with the new economic policies by PM Rajiv Gandhi, Harshad’s fate sees a growth spurt in business. With growth, comes limelight. Is it for good or bad?

episodes.name: Paise Ki Dukaan
episodes.description: Harshad gets lured into the money market following a jibe from Ajay Kedia, the broker from Calcutta. Once in the money market, he learns that the shots are being called by Citibank and its chain of brokers. Building his own cartel, Harshad starts giving them ‘bankerage’. With SBI as his client, will Harshad’s fortune turn around for good?

episodes.name: Harshad Mehta Is A Liar
episodes.description: Harshad’s sudden success spurt catches many eyes. One such is that of Sucheta Dalal, a financial journalist. She is tracking his activities and is on the lookout for evidence against him. Meanwhile, Harshad indulges in a massive buying spree; a 15000 sq feet house and several cars being an example. Will this pompous life go down well for him?

episodes.name: Kundli Mein Shani
episodes.description: Finding suspicious fund movements in Harshad’s SBI account, the RBI Governor directs the bank to start tracking his account. Harshad, in order to be on the safe side, asks Sitaraman not to present the 500 crores sum in the accounting records. With RBI’s close surveillance and shrinking stock market, will Harshad be able to hold his grip firmly?

episodes.name: Stop Press
episodes.description: Sucheta receives a lead from Bellary regarding the 500 crores that is apparently missing from Harshad’s books. At the same time she is shocked to know that Harshad has smartly paid off most of his debts to SBI. She has just twenty four hours in hand to expose him. Where will this chase end?

episodes.name: Dalal Street Ka Dariya
episodes.description: Venkitarajan becomes aware of more than one bank being involved in the money scam. This in turn widens the scope of the entire scam scenario and an RBI investigation is set up which sheds more light into Harshad’s fraud as well. Some shocking facts are brought to light, compelling a CBI investigation thereof. What awaits Harshad at the end of this investigation?

episodes.name: Matador
episodes.description: Sucheta grabs a big piece of information when Venkitarajan lets her in on the news of NHB’s involvement in the scam. Based on the news published by Sucheta, CBI officer Madhavan begins grilling Pherwani. Fearing that Pherwani may spill the beans, Harshad connects with Delhi. Pherwani is later found dead. Is there a connection between Harshad’s Delhi call and Pherwani’s death?

episodes.name: Ek Crore Ka Suitcase
episodes.description: Harshad’s friend, Bhushan during the CBI interrogation threatens to expose the former’s Delhi allies. After Madhavan resigns from his post, there is no further reason to keep Harshad behind the bars. After serving imprisonment for 111 days, the fraudster is finally out in the open and holds a press conference, the revelations in which, are good enough to shake up quite a few who matter.

episodes.name: Main History Banana Chahta hoon
episodes.description: Following the disturbing press conference release, Delhi offers a deal to Harshad, based on which he withdraws his press statement. With most of his assets standing defunct, Harshad goes back to restore Growmore. Bhushan’s revelation that Harshad holds the benaami shares proves to be too costly. Watch what becomes of Harshad ultimately.

name: Live Telecast
description: A TV crew goes to a haunted house, where a family lives, to create a new live show that captures ghost on camera, only to be trapped inside with no way of getting out.

episodes.name: The Introduction
episodes.description: Retelling real-life paranormal stories is what Jenny and her team does best, and their show, Dark Tales, is proof of that. But the otherworldly may be closer than they think.

episodes.name: The Failure
episodes.description: Dark Tales faces a crisis, but its team won't go away without a fight. Meanwhile, a secret from Sekar's past shows Jenny a way ahead.

episodes.name: The Prep
episodes.description: Once Dark Tales is axed and Jenny sells her idea to the channel, the team settles on a haunted house in Yelagiri. Enter Shenbagam and her two children.

episodes.name: The Show
episodes.description: Lights, camera, live! Shenbagam recounts her experiences in the house, and Jenny uses special effects to keep the viewers hooked. But one of the extra actors is just not ordinary.

episodes.name: The Trap
episodes.description: The unthinkable happens while the world watches. When the crew tries to escape their ordeal, something is hell-bent on keeping them inside the house.

episodes.name: The Escape
episodes.description: ACP Guru tries his best to help the trapped crew but in vain. Finally, Jenny reaches the end of her tether and makes a compromise.

episodes.name: The Climax
episodes.description: The culprit responsible for everyone's misery makes his appearance, and he has no intention of letting anyone go. However, Sekar is the only one who can stop him.

name: Santosh
description: A government scheme sees newly widowed Santosh inherit her husband’s job as a police constable in the rural badlands of Northern India. When a low-caste girl is found raped and murdered, she is pulled into the investigation under the wing of charismatic feminist inspector Sharma.

name: Paatal Lok
description: A down and out cop lands the case of a lifetime when four suspects are nabbed in the assassination attempt of a prime time journalist. The case turns out to be a devious maze where nothing is what it looks like. The pursuit of it leads him to the dark netherworld - the 'Paatal Lok', and to shocking discoveries in the past of the four suspects.

episodes.name: Bridges
episodes.description: Inspector Hathi Ram Chaudhary is going through his dead beat job when he lands up a big investigation. Three men and a woman have been arrested for the attempt to murder a big prime time journalist Sanjeev Mehra, and Hathi Ram is asked to build a case. Meanwhile, for Mehra, this news couldn’t have come at a worse time for he struggles with problems at work and a boss who wants to fire him.

episodes.name: Lost and Found
episodes.description: Hathi Ram and Ansari use every technique in the book to interrogate the four suspects. Finally they manage to break one of them and his statement points to a certain ‘Master ji’ from Chitrakoot. Meanwhile pressure mounts on Sanjeev Mehra at the work front.

episodes.name: A history of violence
episodes.description: Hathi Ram reaches Chitrakoot and meets Tyagi's family and school teacher. He comes to know of the beginning of Tyagi's criminal record, and the people Tyagi worked for. Meanwhile Ansari conducts a parallel investigation in Punjab and finds out about Tope Singh's dark past. Sanjeev Mehra pulls off a coup on his television show, surprising friends and foes alike.

episodes.name: Sleepless in Seelampur
episodes.description: Hathi Ram gets sucked further into the case, but the investigation hits a dead end with the mysterious death of a key suspect. Sanjeev Mehra starts forming a plan to cash in on his renewed popularity. A procedureal screw up gets blown up and lands Hathi Ram in serious trouble with the bosses.

episodes.name: Of fathers and sons
episodes.description: Hathi Ram, suspended from his job, struggles to keep himself away from the case while dealing with rising issues at home. Sanjeev Mehra makes a dubious populist move that does not go well with Sara and creates a rift in their budding romance. CBI starts investigating the case and comes up with a shocking theory.

episodes.name: The past is prologue
episodes.description: Hathi Ram travels into the past of Kabir and Cheeni, and that makes him further convinced that the CBI's 'terrorism theory' is fabricated. Hathi Ram's son lands into serious trouble with the bad guys and he is forced to step in and take action.

episodes.name: Badlands
episodes.description: Hathi Ram travels to Chitrakoot to pick up the missing threads from where he last left them. Further details emerge on Tyagi's mysterious 'Masterji' and Tyagi's close emotional bond with him. Hathi Ram tails the dangerous Gwala Gujjar, Master ji's brother, and almost gets caught in the act.

episodes.name: Black Widow
episodes.description: Following Tyagi's political links, Hathi Ram comes across a mysterious woman who turns out to be the missing link between Tyagi and Tope Singh's story. Hathi Ram pieces together clues that lead him to a startling discovery concerning Master ji.

episodes.name: Swarg ka Dwaar
episodes.description: On the run from Gwala's dangerous men, Hathi Ram manages to piece together the entire jigsaw puzzle. Sanjeev's pride at his takeover of the business is bursted by Hathi Ram's shocking revelations. Tyagi discovers the truth about Master ji and that leads him to fulfilling his childhood prophecy. Hathi Ram is grudgingly handed back his badge by the Police Department.

episodes.name: Head On
episodes.description: On a cold winter morning in Lutyens’ Delhi, the room service staff at Nagaland Sadan discover a decapitated head. The victim Jonathan Thom, a Naga leader, was in Delhi for the important Naga Business Summit. IPS officer Ansari leads the murder investigation. Meanwhile, Hathi Ram, investigates a migrant worker's disappearance, only to chance upon a startling discovery.

episodes.name: Kohima Calling
episodes.description: DCP Bhardwaj reviews CCTV footage of Raghu Paswan and Rose Lizo. Hathi Ram hopes to join Ansari on the case but is turned down. Hathi Ram investigates a lead that leads to a drug bust but ACP Virk claims the credit. A video of three masked individuals claiming responsibility for Thom's murder stirs media frenzy. In Nagaland, a constable spots Rose Lizo.

episodes.name: Four Murders And A Funeral
episodes.description: Hathi Ram and Ansari meet SP Meghna Barua in Nagaland who is sceptical of their presence. Tensions rise at Thom's funeral at the arrival of Thom's estranged son Reuben. Hathi Ram and Ansari learn of Thom’s illicit businesses. A drug dealer, a potential lead in their case, ends up dead. And so do the three individuals who had claimed responsibility for Jonathan Thom’s murder.

episodes.name: Missed Call
episodes.description: Hathi Ram and Ansari investigate the murder of the three individuals, only to realise that the three were set up for this. Hathi Ram discovers Raghu Paswan’s link to Reddy’s hotel before travelling to Delhi for his son’s birthday. Meanwhile, Ansari discovers a lead on Rose Lizo and goes looking for her, but so do Reuben and Daniel, Thom’s security officer.

episodes.name: Off Balance
episodes.description: The police look for Rose Lizo in the jungles she last disappeared in. Daniel is out there looking for her too. Hathi Ram deals with a personal tragedy in Delhi, and an enquiry into what went wrong back in Kohima. Unable to live with the fact that Ansari is being made the scapegoat, Hathi Ram decides to take matters in his own hands.

episodes.name: Of Mothers And Daughters
episodes.description: Hathi Ram and Meghna unite their meagre forces against a raging mob of Thom’s supporters that attacks the hospital Rose Lizo is admitted in. Hathi Ram investigates the murder of a businessman and realises that Reuben has been made the fall guy for the murder. A personal injury leads Hathi Ram to the startling discovery that Rose has a child.

episodes.name: Children Of Men
episodes.description: Hathi Ram is abducted and taken to meet Reuben but Meghna manages to be on the tail. Hathi Ram finally comes face to face with Reuben and discovers Reddy’s close links with Thom’s drug business. ACP Virk helps Hathi Ram discover Daniel’s connection to Langchoma which helps Hathi Ram make a startling discovery about Uncle Ken. But before he can reveal it to Meghna, a tragedy strikes.

episodes.name: The Good Samaritan
episodes.description: Hathi Ram confronts Daniel on Christmas eve and finally manages to avenge Ansari’s death. The business summit is a success in Delhi and Uncle Ken is hailed, forcing Hathi Ram to reconsider his choices. Hathi Ram returns to Delhi and eventually manages to learn about Raghu Paswan’s innocence and his unnecessary death.

name: Thukra Ke Mera Pyaar
description: Two families clash over societal and caste differences spurring a saga of revenge. All this happens when a love story goes wrong.

episodes.name: Chauhano Ki Shaan
episodes.description: Shanvika, the arrogant daughter of the elite Chauhan family. Kuldeep, a poor but brilliant young man. A broken bicycle leads to a meaningful exchange between the two.

episodes.name: Humse Dosti Karoge?
episodes.description: Nakul and his cronies try to snatch Kuldeep's new bicycle from him, leading to a fight. Shanvika interferes, and she poses a question to Kuldeep.

episodes.name: Aapki Pehchan Hai Kya?
episodes.description: Kuldeep's disinterest in her proposal makes Shanvika angry. She vows to outscore him academically, setting the stage for competition.

episodes.name: Namak Harami Mat Karna
episodes.description:
Shanvika misbehaves with Inspector Dushyant Singh when she declares

she'll rank first in her class. Her "hard work" bears fruit, and Kuldeep goes missing. Where did he go?

episodes.name: Ishq Hua Hai!
episodes.description: Shanvika and Kuldeep's romance blossoms. However, one day, Pushkar and his men bust their blissful moment, leading to tension between the families.

episodes.name: Galti Hamari Nahi Thi
episodes.description: Shanvika's declaration leads to Kuldeep's family being humiliated in public. They flee for life after Pushkar sets fire to their house, but Simmi's tragic step shatters them.

episodes.name: Saaye Mai Dhoop
episodes.description: Kuldeep starts driving a rickshaw for a living. Prerna, a passenger preparing for the UPSC exams, inspires him to reflect on his dreams and look forward to a bright future.

episodes.name: Namak Haram
episodes.description: Family pressures Shanvika into marrying Dushyant reluctantly. Kuldeep focuses on studies but faces devastation after a fateful call.

episodes.name: Tu Hoga Kamyaab
episodes.description: Shanvika's rejection of Dushyant on their wedding night sparks turmoil. Kuldeep grapples with inner conflicts as Prerna guides him to harness his anger constructively.

episodes.name: Chaman Mein Deedawar
episodes.description: Kuldeep's life hangs in the balance as he faces his UPSC final interview and his mother's coma. The UPSC results bring a shocking revelation, especially those in Sitaarpur.

episodes.name: Mera Lakshya Kuch Aur Hai
episodes.description: Kuldeep's political return sparks chaos when he proposes building a bridge in a Chauhan area. Daddu proposes an easy way for him to do it.

episodes.name: Astitwa ki Ladai
episodes.description: Under Kuldeep's orders, all boating operations are sealed, paving the way for the bridge project. During his and Mala's wedding, tensions escalate with the arrival of the Chauhans.

episodes.name: Bhoot, Bhavishya, Vartaman
episodes.description: The Chauhans are infuriated seeing Dushyant guarding Kuldeep. Mala speaks to her new husband about their future. The Chauhan's face losses when their businesses are raided.

episodes.name: Woh Badla Lene Hi Aaya Hai
episodes.description: Dushyant warns Shanvika of Kuldeep's desire for revenge but she refuses to engage. Fed up with Kuldeep's high handed behaviour, the Chauhans hire Gauri to kill him.

episodes.name: Kuch Bachna Nahi Chahiye
episodes.description: Gauri, on the run from the police, is abducted by unknown men. He urgently contacts Angad to meet the Chauhans at their hideout. Meanwhile, Kuldeep raids the Chauhan's house

episodes.name: Ghar Ka Malik Bhag Chala
episodes.description: The Chauhan brothers surrender, which creates a sensation. In prison, Manohar wonders about his past actions. Meanwhile, Kuldeep throws a party and invites Dushyant and Shanvika

episodes.name: Ab Apna Rasta Badal Lo
episodes.description: Dushyant decides to resign, but Kuldeep refuses and makes an offer. Gendalal warns Kuldeep about Daddu, who has a different plan for Chauhan's son in law.

episodes.name: Sab Kuch Khatam Ho Gaya
episodes.description: Daddu instructs SP Mishra to apprehend Pushkar, but he flees. Shanvika consoles a troubled Dushyant. Kuldeep meets his childhood friend Pintu, who advises him.

episodes.name: Ab Humari Baari
episodes.description: Kuldeep finally learns why Shanvika lied about their relationship. Tragedy strikes yet again, and Shanvika has no choice but to pick up the pieces of her shattered life.

name: Big Mouth
description: A lawyer with a ten-percent winning rate is caught up in a murder case and becomes the notorious and genius con artist, Big Mouse, overnight. In order to survive and protect his family, he tries to reveal the true colors of the privileged people involved in a huge conspiracy.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.description: Changho, who has no money and is about to lose his wife, receives a call from the mayor of Gucheon.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Changho is charged with drug abuse and locked up in Gucheon Prison.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Changho needs to maintain recognition as Big Mouse to protect Miho.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.description: Gong Jihoon makes a bet with Changho to find out his true identity.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.description: Jihoon approaches Miho to find Seo Jaeyoung's thesis. Does Miho know Changho's true identity?

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.description: Miho joins the prison medical volunteer program to meet Changho.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.description: Jaeho warns Changho to stop looking into Seo Jaeyoung's thesis. Miho is suddenly attacked.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.description: Changho is in a mental hospital. Will Changho be able to hide his identity in a state of confusion?

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.description: Changho stands as an informant in Seo Jaeyoung's trial, and Jihoon and Jungrak search for Changho.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.description: Changho calls out Big Mouse, and an unexpected character turns up at the agreed time.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.description: Changho shifts the power dynamics in the prison to pressure Big Mouse. Doha plants a new warden.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.description: The warden plans to use the prison riots to take out Changho and Miho.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.description: The hot-plate restaurant is in ruins. The agitated Changho meets someone unexpected there.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.description: Changho makes a tempting offer to Chairman Kang. Doha conspires with Yoongab to get rid of Changho.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.description: Changho prepares for the full-fledged elections against Doha, but Miho's health is in trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.description: The TV debate begins, and the smoking gun that will bring down Choi Doha is at Miho's fingers.

name: The Railway Men - The Untold Story of Bhopal 1984
description: India, 1984. After a deadly gas leaks from a factory in Bhopal, brave railway workers risk their lives to save others in the face of an unspeakable disaster.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.description: In the hours leading to the disaster, the Union Carbide higher-ups downplay safety concerns at the factory while unwitting souls hang in the balance.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: As the gas descends on the city, passengers at Bhopal Junction break into a frenzy for their lives — and a brave station master springs into action.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: The gas holds the Bhopal passengers hostage while railway workers scramble to figure out a plan. Meanwhile, a visitor to India may have an antidote.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.description: As new threats rocket towards Bhopal Junction, the railway men face unthinkable dilemmas. Can they act quickly enough to save others — and themselves?
